Description: Centralised Coffee Masters hub that serves as the single source of truth for Coffee Masters and their certifications across all districts and stores. Supports quick filtering by district and store to locate partners and review certification status. Displays key KPIs: total stores, total Coffee Masters, average Coffee Masters per store, certification completion rate, counts of certified vs in-progress, and overdue renewals, enabling leaders to monitor progress, identify gaps, and prioritise follow-up.
